接口 AnswerService

public interface AnswerService extends DAO<Answer>

    • updateAnswer

      Integer updateAnswer(Long answerId, String content, Integer status, Date lastUpdateTime, String userName)
      修改答案
      参数:
      answerId - 答案Id
      content - 内容
      status - 状态
      lastUpdateTime - 最后修改时间
      userName - 用户名称
      返回:

    • updateAdoptionAnswer

      int updateAdoptionAnswer(Long questionId, Long answerId, boolean changeAdoption, String cancelAdoptionUserName, Object cancelAdoptionPointLogObject, BigDecimal cancelAdoptionUserNameShareAmount, Object cancelAdoptionPaymentLogObject, String userName, Long point, Object pointLogObject, BigDecimal amount, Object paymentLogObject, QuestionRewardPlatformShare questionRewardPlatformShare)
      采纳答案
      参数:
      questionId - 问题Id
      answerId - 答案Id
      changeAdoption - 是否更改采纳答案
      cancelAdoptionUserName - 取消采纳用户名称
      cancelAdoptionPointLogObject - 取消采纳用户退还悬赏积分日志
      cancelAdoptionUserNameShareAmount - 取消采纳用户退还分成金额
      cancelAdoptionPaymentLogObject - 取消采纳用户退还悬赏金额日志
      userName - 回答的用户名称
      point - 扣减用户积分
      pointLogObject - 积分日志
      amount - 扣减用户预存款
      paymentLogObject - 支付日志
      questionRewardPlatformShare - 平台分成
      返回:

    • updateCancelAdoptionAnswer

      int updateCancelAdoptionAnswer(Long questionId, String cancelAdoptionUserName, Object cancelAdoptionPointLogObject, BigDecimal cancelAdoptionUserNameShareAmount, Object cancelAdoptionPaymentLogObject, Long point)
      取消采纳答案
      参数:
      questionId - 问题Id
      cancelAdoptionUserName - 取消采纳用户名称
      cancelAdoptionPointLogObject - 取消采纳用户退还悬赏积分日志
      cancelAdoptionUserNameShareAmount - 取消采纳用户退还分成金额
      cancelAdoptionPaymentLogObject - 取消采纳用户退还悬赏金额日志
      point - 扣减用户积分
      返回:
